div.p: In many villages, access to technology education remains limited. This creates a digital divide, preventing communities from leveraging technological advancements for economic and social growth.

Villagers often lack the resources and knowledge to understand the impact of climate change on their surroundings. This lack of awareness makes it difficult to adapt and mitigate the effects of environmental changes.
Poor infrastructure, including unreliable internet connectivity and inadequate access to educational tools, further exacerbates these challenges, leaving rural areas disconnected from progress.
